altername_name: Cavallo & Pony: La Scuola di Equitazione
name: Real Stories: Cheval Academy
overview: Real Stories: Cheval Academy on DS is part of a range of games that offer many adventures and experiences for all girls. It is here in the company of the most beautiful horses that the game will take the players -and the players-, to fulfill many challenges (brush your horse, ride it in different environments, etc.).
